thread.title: Rob Gronkowski has only one question for Patriots fans
thread.title_full: Rob Gronkowski has only one question for Patriots fans

title: Rob Gronkowski has only one question for Patriots fans
text:
Rob Gronkowski has only one question for Patriots fans: ‘Who’s getting wild tonight?’ Rob Gronkowski has only one question for Patriots fans: ‘Who’s getting wild tonight?’ Rob Gronkowski at the Patriots' victory parade. –David L Ryan/Globe Staff Photo By Hayden Bird 2:06   
Speaking at the Patriots’ Super Bowl victory celebration on Tuesday, Rob Gronkowski was predictably in good spirits. 
When handed a live mic, Gronkowski had a simple question for Patriots fans: “Who’s getting wild tonight?” 
The crowd reacted with predictable enthusiasm. Wouldn't be a Patriots parade without Gronk giggling at a 69 joke pic.twitter.com/yl2SQ4Gp9H 
— Pete Blackburn (@PeteBlackburn) February 7, 2017 Advertisement
